text: Ani tumhi tyanna pahala ki te (jahannamacya) samora anuna ubhe kele jatila. Apamanapayi jhukata jatila, khalacya najarene pahata asatila. Imana rakhanare spastapane sangatila ki, vastutah totyata rahanare te loka aheta, jyanni aja kayamatacya divasi svatahla ani apalya kutumbiyanna hanigrasta kele. Laksata theva ki, atyacari loka niscitaca kayamasvarupi azabamadhye aheta
